title: Define the gamification mechanics
description: Develop the rules and systems that turn tasks into quests

title: Design the user interface
description: Create an intuitive and engaging layout for the application

title: Implement basic functionality
description: Build the fundamental features of the application

title: Develop the task creation and management system
description: Create a robust system for users to create, edit, and manage tasks

title: Integrate the gamification mechanics into the system
description: Ensure that the gamification rules are correctly applied throughout the application
dependencies: Develop the task creation and management system

title: Test the application for functionality and usability
description: Perform thorough testing to ensure that the application functions correctly and is user-friendly

title: Write technical documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including API references and user guides

title: Secure the application
description: Implement necessary security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access

title: Deploy the application
description: Prepare and launch the application for production use
dependencies: Test the application for functionality and usability

title: Review and provide feedback on gamification mechanics design
description: Assess the effectiveness of the gamification design and provide constructive feedback

title: Review and provide feedback on user interface design
description: Evaluate the quality of the user interface design and offer suggestions for improvement

title: Review and provide feedback on basic functionality implementation
description: Assess the quality of the basic application functionality and offer constructive feedback
